skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: escape the school
des: Your goal in this game is to escape the school as fast as possible. You can use phrases such as, "Look at", "Inspect", "Inventory", and more. Good luck!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
